doc.title: Love Like Blood
doc.plot: Blake Edwards is a slightly-anemic high-school boy with a bright future, until he meets mysterious, poetic beauty Jira. His intense, erotic relationship with her turns his life upside down. Only cerebral and determined classmate Yumi can help Blake find his true path in this demented and haunting coming-of-age tale. Based on the international best-selling manga Lament of the Lamb.
